document_data.name: Lake Halruaa
document_data.mainbody: '''Lake Halruaa''' was located toward the center of [[Halruaa]].
document_data.Geography:
Filled by the Rivers [[River Halar|Halar]], [[River Maeru|Maeru]] and [[River Aluar|Aluar]], Lake Halruaa dominated the center of the Halruaan landscape.

Wind blowing down from the mountains made navigating Lake Halruaa tricky, but it did offer a slight respite from the blazing temperatures that most of the country experienced year round.
